metadata.title: CVE-2015-4715 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The fetch function in OAuth/Curl.php in Dropbox-PHP, as used in ownCloudServer before 6.0.8, 7.x before 7.0.6, and 8.x before 8.0.4 when anexternal Dropbox storage has been mounted, allows remote administrators ofDropbox.com to read arbitrary files via an @ (at sign) character inunspecified POST values.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4715` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dropbox - 1.0.0-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-dropbox package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-4').
